page.title: 11THE DAILY LIFE OF A ADULT
page.content: My name is Peter Tiley. I am handyman to Beachborough School, a preparatory school for boys and girls aged 4 to 13 The school occupies the old Manor House and although new classrooms have been added and a gymn, the old rooms are still used for dormitories, dining rooms offices etc. so there is a lot of repair and restoration to be done. At the moment I am finishing some work on old lead on the dormer windows. Then there is a bathroom conversion to do.I have just found a piece of newspaper wrapped round the old bath waste.It is dated September 1903 and comes from Barnstaple.Sir Samuel Scott bought the house in 1901 and he had a lot of alterations made after that.On Fridays I take the children for woodwork and in the Spring term there is the scenery for the school musical to make and paint.
